text: aur moosa kee qaum ne (kohetoor par) unake jaane ke baad apane jevaron ko (galaakar) ek bachhade kee moorat banaee (yaani) ek jism jisamen gae kee see aavaaz thee (aphasos) kya un logon ne itana bhee na dekha ki vah na to unase baat hee kar sakata aur na kisee tarah kee hidaayat hee kar sakata hai (khulaasa) un logon ne use (apanee maabood bana liya)
